sentences.en: AIM: To investigate the relation between left ventricular torsion(LVtor)/ rotation and cardiac cycle in normal persons by speckle tracking imaging(STI).

sentences.en: Major techniques and methods in speckle metrology are reviewed.

sentences.en: Objective To establish a novel speckle tracking algorithm for estimating myocardial motion.

sentences.cn: 斑点噪声是超声图像中固有的噪声.
